change.description: Zaqef is indistinct, add note 't'.
change.refuni: ayin hiriq mem dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh
change.changeuni: ayin hiriq mem dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh

notes.note: The lower dot of the zaqef is very faint.
Some texts read the accent as a revia, rather than a zaqef. A revia would break cantillation rules: a pashta (word 6) must be in the domain of a zaqef.

change.description: Zaqef is indistinct, add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed sheva alef munah vav dagesh resh hiriq yod dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he
change.changeuni: lamed sheva alef munah vav dagesh resh hiriq yod dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he

notes.note: The upper dot of the zaqef is very faint and merges with the lower dot.
Some texts read the accent as a revia, rather than a zaqef. A revia would break cantillation rules: a pashta (word 2) must be in the domain of a zaqef.

change.description: Vav is unbroken in the LC, add note 'c'.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot qamats lamed meteg vav holam final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot qamats lamed meteg vav holam final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: Later Ashkenazi texts have a broken vav; the earlier LC and MAM texts do not.

change.description: Add CGJ to position early meteg correctly.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva alef hiriq nun sheva dalet dagesh patah zaqef-gadol ayin
change.changeuni: vav meteg combining-grapheme-joiner sheva alef hiriq nun sheva dalet dagesh patah zaqef-gadol ayin

change.description: Add CGJ to position early meteg correctly.

notes.note: The sheva is blurred.

change.refuni: vav meteg sheva yod qamats resh sheva dalet gershayim vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav meteg combining-grapheme-joiner sheva yod qamats resh sheva dalet gershayim vav dagesh

change.description: Add CGJ to position early meteg correctly.

notes.note: The accents on the yod are messy.

change.refuni: yod meteg sheva mem patah lamed dagesh tsere merkha tet
change.changeuni: yod meteg combining-grapheme-joiner sheva mem patah lamed dagesh tsere merkha tet

change.description: Add CGJ to position early meteg correctly.
change.refuni: lamed meteg sheva he patah ayin hataf-patah lamed vav holam tav telisha-qetana
change.changeuni: lamed meteg combining-grapheme-joiner sheva he patah ayin hataf-patah lamed vav holam tav telisha-qetana

change.description: Add CGJ to position early meteg correctly.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva telisha-gedola he qamats yod qamats he
change.changeuni: vav meteg combining-grapheme-joiner sheva telisha-gedola he qamats yod qamats he

change.description: Odd vowels on bet, add note 'c'.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof sheva bet dagesh holam sheva merkha resh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof sheva bet dagesh holam sheva merkha resh

change.description: Add CGJ to better position accents on first tav.
change.refuni: mem hiriq tav dagesh qamats etnahta patah geresh het patah tav
change.changeuni: mem hiriq tav dagesh qamats etnahta combining-grapheme-joiner patah geresh het patah tav

notes.note: The word is in a Decalogue.

change.description: Add CGJ to better position accents on the nun.
change.refuni: pe dagesh qamats nun qamats zero-width-joiner meteg patah revia yod
change.changeuni: pe dagesh qamats nun qamats zero-width-joiner meteg combining-grapheme-joiner patah revia yod

notes.note: The word is in a Decalogue, its parallel is Deut 5:7.7.

change.description: Add CGJ to better position accents on the nun.
change.refuni: pe dagesh qamats nun qamats zero-width-joiner meteg patah revia yod
change.changeuni: pe dagesh qamats nun qamats zero-width-joiner meteg combining-grapheme-joiner patah revia yod

notes.note: The qamats on the nun is faint.
The word is in a Decalogue, its parallel is Ex 20:3.7.

change.description: Order accents on the lamed to match LC.
change.refuni: lamed holam munah meteg alef
change.changeuni: lamed holam meteg munah alef

notes.note: The word is in a Decalogue, its parallel is Deut 5:8.1.

change.description: Order accents on the lamed to match LC.
change.refuni: lamed holam munah meteg alef
change.changeuni: lamed holam meteg munah alef

notes.note: The word is in a Decalogue.

change.description: Order accents on the lamed to match LC.
change.refuni: lamed holam munah meteg alef maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed holam meteg munah alef maqaf

notes.note: The word is in a Decalogue.

change.description: Order accents on the lamed to match LC.
change.refuni: lamed holam munah meteg alef maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed holam meteg munah alef maqaf

notes.note: The word is in a Decalogue.

change.description: Remove dagesh from het, add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem patah het dagesh hataf-patah mem patah dalet dagesh hiriq etnahta yod final-mem
change.changeuni: mem patah het hataf-patah mem patah dalet dagesh hiriq etnahta yod final-mem

notes.note: The dagesh is reddish and slightly oversized. Hets normally do not have dageshes.

change.description: In the LC the shin base letter has no dots, add note 'c'.
change.refuni: alef hiriq merkha yod shin
change.changeuni: alef hiriq merkha yod shin

notes.note: This shin is one of 3 shins in the LC, other than in the word "יששכר", that lacks either a shin dot or a sin dot.

change.description: In the LC the shin base letter has no dots, add note 'c'.
change.refuni: shin qamats mem patah tipeha yod hiriq final-mem
change.changeuni: shin qamats mem patah tipeha yod hiriq final-mem

notes.note: This shin is one of 3 shins in the LC, other than in the word "יששכר", that lacks either a shin dot or a sin dot.

change.description: In the LC the shin base letter has no dots, add note 'c'.
change.refuni: shin tsere yod bet qamats tipeha he
change.changeuni: shin tsere yod bet qamats tipeha he

notes.note: This shin is one of 3 shins in the LC, other than in the word "יששכר", that lacks either a shin dot or a sin dot.

date.title: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed

summary.note: The shape of the zarqa in the LC is best represented in the Ezra SIL font.

change.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
change.refuni: vav dagesh meteg lamed sheva yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva mem qamats ayin tsere zarqa alef lamed
change.changeuni: vav dagesh meteg lamed sheva yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva mem qamats ayin tsere alef lamed zarqa

date.title: Notation of missing accents in the LC and correction of 3 errors in the UXLC.

summary.note: The Leningrad Codex is missing accents on a few (24) chanted words (of 260,934 chanted words). A note 'c' is appended to these words. The corresponding detailed notes describe the markings of the Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) for these words.

change.description: Word lacks accent, add note 'c'; MAM ends the word with a Maqaf ( ס־ ).
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol resh
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol resh

change.description: Word lacks accent, add note 'c'; MAM ends the word with a Maqaf ( ס־ ).
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva ayin segol dalet sheva resh tsere yod
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva ayin segol dalet sheva resh tsere yod

change.description: Add Pashta ( ס֙ ) to final Mem.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah pe dagesh sheva lamed hiriq shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh hiriq yod final-mem
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah pe dagesh sheva lamed hiriq shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh hiriq yod final-mem pashta

change.description: Word lacks accent, add note 'c'; MAM has a Tipeha ( ס֖ ) to the final Kaf on this word.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh patah bet dagesh segol resh sheva final-kaf qamats
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh patah bet dagesh segol resh sheva final-kaf qamats

change.description: Word lacks accent, add note 'c'; MAM has a Telisha Qetana ( ס֩ ) to the final Lamed on this word.
change.refuni: vav sheva he patah gimel dagesh sheva bet vav dagesh lamed
change.changeuni: vav sheva he patah gimel dagesh sheva bet vav dagesh lamed

change.description: Add Merkha ( ס֥ ) to the Ayin, add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva resh holam ayin segol he
change.changeuni: vav sheva resh holam ayin segol merkha he

notes.note: A distinct vertical line appears under the Ayin. The line could represent a Meteg; however, a Merkha is more reasonable.
The Miqra according to the Masorah (MAM) has a Merkha in this position.
The LC text is in poor condition on this page.

change.description: Word lacks accent, add note 'c'; MAM has a Revia ( ס֗ ) to the Yod on this word.
change.refuni: vav dagesh bet sheva yod patah dalet
change.changeuni: vav dagesh bet sheva yod patah dalet

notes.note: The image and LC line number were corrected on 15 Jan 2023. The transcription note, 'c', was removed in Changes file 2023.04.01, change item 2022.12.10 - 44.

change.description: Add Maqaf ( ס־ ) to final Tav.
change.refuni: vav dagesh nun sheva vav patah tav
change.changeuni: vav dagesh nun sheva vav patah tav maqaf

change.description: Word lacks accent, add note 'c'; MAM has a Etnahta ( ס֑ ) to the Lamed on this word.
change.refuni: vav dagesh shin shin-dot sheva lamed final-mem
change.changeuni: vav dagesh shin shin-dot sheva lamed final-mem

notes.note: The shuruq and upper Sheva dots are very light.
The LC already has an Etnahta on the preceding word.
A Masorah Circle appears over the Lamed.

change.changeuni: ayin patah tsadi sheva mem tsere kaf segol final-mem
